>
[Pack Rat](/Feats.aspx?ID=5652) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ratfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=769" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 30 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You've learned how to cram vast quantities into small spaces. You can fit an additional 50% of the listed Bulk capacity into mundane storage containers or vehicles. For example, you can fit 6 Bulk in a [backpack](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2704), or 12 Bulk in a [chest](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2712). This doesn't alter the items' Bulk, nor does it change how much you can store in a [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=644) or [extradimensional](/Traits.aspx?ID=596) storage space, such as a [_spacious pouch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3032).
name: Pack Rat
